locations.name: Shanghai
locations.description: The tour begins here, exploring its futuristic skyline, historic lanes, art districts, and dining scene.

locations.name: Beijing
locations.description: The second stop, featuring visits to the Great Wall, Forbidden City, Summer Palace, and traditional hutongs.

locations.name: Lijiang
locations.description: An escape to the Naxi kingdom, focused on exploring the UNESCO-listed Old Town and soaking in the unique culture.

locations.name: Yangshuo
locations.description: Characterized by dramatic karst landscapes, river rafting (Li/Yulong), and countryside exploration.

locations.name: Hong Kong
locations.description: The concluding destination, offering iconic skyline views, vibrant markets, and world-class cuisine.
